sentence.Network_en: You can characterize his behavior as that of an egotist.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以把他的行为归结为一种自我中心主义行为.

sentence.Network_en: Marian is such an egotist that she talks about herself all the time.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛利亚过于以自我为中心,喋喋不休地谈论自己.

entry.tran: 自我中心者;自私自利者;自我主义者
entry.def: An egotist is someone who is egotistic.
